overview: Aji is a cyborg with a passion for mobile games. At this moment, he was running naked in the middle of the night in the city, discussing what true courage is. I saw an orange-red cyborg scarf hung around his neck and a pair of underpants underneath him streaking across the campus and the dimly lit city. A set of images is opposite to the images of Ah Ji running; the fierce battle scenes in the biography of the gods; Hitomi dancing ballet on the rooftop; Ye San in the panda suit of the robot friend walking chickens on the campus; the thrilling white legs of a woman Going up to the waist of Gaofushuai Lianfeng; Xiao Wu made herself a woman in the mirror, Xiao Wu Qianying was amazed by A Ji's afterglow. Dew hovered over Xiao Wu's rugged figure. The temptation to expose the figure of the little witch in the witch costume in "The Legend of the Gods"! Aji lost consciousness and ran into a pillar (or car) for a while. The sky is spinning, and I fainted to the ground...
title: Tian Shen Zhuan
